title: RORD
name: Related Order Number
definition: Identifies a provider's related order number.
fieldNotes: This field may be used to convey a CENTREX order number obtained from the provider representative handling the CENTREX account.
validEntryNotes: This telephone number would be customer owned and identified during customer/provider pre- negotiations.
usageNotes: Required when the provider has pre-assigned  a  related order number, otherwise prohibited.
